system.descriptionText: -5 Weapon Skill, +5 Intelligence, and +3 to any one Characteristic. Common Lore (Tech) and Common Lore (Machine Cult) are untrained basic skills. Gain Technical Knock Talent. Suffer -10 to Tests involving knowledge of the Imperial Creed and -5 to Fellowship tests to interact with members of the Ecclesiarchy in formal settings.
